Body: Lead generation platform LeadRex is designing which purposely to automate all the processes with maximum level for creating and launching of advertising campaigns. Platform has a user-friendly and intuitive interface which is supported by comprehensible system of interactive tips for easier to study of the services. By the help of these tips, any user can quickly and correctly launch their advertising campaign regardless of the level of knowledge in this area. Initiation of using the service each user must be registered in the user’s personal account or agent’s personal account — depends on who launches the advertising campaign (for security will be used 2fa authorization). After the launch of the advertising campaign, the user of the platform through the personal cabinet monitors the effectiveness of the launched advertising campaign and if desired, disables or enables new components. Also, the user will receive information about the advertising campaign in the messenger. The user will be able to manage some components, disable and enable them through messages in instant messengers. This feature will allow the user to control their advertising campaigns, even does not have an access to the computer.
